string-array.item: Elizabeth is a sales associate at a local high-end jewellery store. She prefers healthy lifestyle, going to the gym at least three times a week, and spending her free time outdoors.

Jane is a product manager from New York, who travels very often for business. For business trips, Jane prefers to rent apartments rather than stay in hotels. For her leisure travel, she usually stays in upper-end hotels for better comfort and travel experience. Jane is a savvy traveller and is hard to impress.

Ben is a toddler. He likes to play flash games on his mother\'s iPad. His parents allow him to play not more than 2 hours per day and the games mainly include logic games aimed at developing abstract mind.
John is a middle-aged fitness coach, a certified dietitian, and wellness expert. He goes to the gym at least five days per week and often works long hours training clients.
Michael goes to primary school. His favourite subjects include mathematics and English lessons. He\'s into fantasy computer games and he spends at least 2 hours a day playing.

Maria is a college student. She\'s an avid online shopper with a considerable online purchase history. She\'s looking for the best deals to purchase a certain item and rarely goes on a shopping spree.
Matt is a marketing manager at a small local agency. He\'s focused on his career goals and has a clear vision of what his career must look like in the next year.
